name: DesShooter
short_description:
Insects always been on your desktop, but you can't see them.
Infecting your computer in search of bugs to make or files to corrupt.
But the IKA (Insects Killer Army) has created a new tool to avoid these creatures.
It's called DesShooter.
Every hidden insects on your computer will be revealated, so you can shoot them up !
Each of them killed will drop coins called "Bp" (Bestial points).
This money will allow you to unlock new weapons, new upgrades.

Featuring :
-Realistic weapon sounds and models.
-Realistic ammo counter.
-Over 5 weapons.
-Unlocks and progress.
-Shoots and insects variations.
-Fast and smart insects.
-Free to play.
